00043 
00044 $ROOT= dirname(dirname(__FILE__));
00045 $VIEW_PATH= $ROOT.'/View/';
00046 $MODEL_PATH= $ROOT.'/Model/';
00047 
00048 require_once($ROOT.'/lib/defs.php');
00049 require_once($ROOT.'/lib/setup.php');
00050 
00051 // chdir is for PCRE, libraries
00052 chdir(dirname(__FILE__));
00053 
00055 if (isset($_SERVER['SERVER_ADDR'])) {
00056     cwc_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, 'Requested on the wui, exiting...');
00057     header('Location: /index.php');
00058     exit(1);
00059 }
00060 
00061 require_once($ROOT.'/lib/lib.php');
00062 require_once('lib.php');
00063 
00064 // Controller runs using the session locale of View
00065 $Locale= $argv[1];
00066 
00067 unset($ViewError);
00068 $retval= 1;
00069 
00070 $View= $argv[2];
00071 
00072 if (array_key_exists($View, $ModelFiles)) {
00073     require_once($MODEL_PATH.$ModelFiles[$View]);
00074 }
00075 else {
00076     cwc_syslog(LOG_NOTICE, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "View not in ModelFiles: $View");
00077 }
00078 
00079 if (class_exists($Models[$View])) {
00080     $Model= new $Models[$View]();
00081 }
00082 else {
00083     require_once($MODEL_PATH.'model.php');
00084     $Model= new Model();
00085     cwc_syslog(LOG_NOTICE, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "View not in Models: $View");
00086 }
00087 
00091 if (!array_key_exists($Locale, $LOCALES)) {
00092     $Locale= $DefaultLocale;
00093 }
00094 
00095 putenv('LC_ALL='.$Locale);
00096 putenv('LANG='.$Locale);
00097 
00098 $Domain= 'comixwall';
00099 bindtextdomain($Domain, $VIEW_PATH.'locale');
00100 bind_textdomain_codeset($Domain, $LOCALES[$Locale]['Codeset']);
00101 textdomain($Domain);
00102 
00103 $Command= $argv[3];
00104 
00105 if (method_exists($Model, $Command)) {
00106 
00107     $ArgV= array_slice($argv, 4);
00108 
00109     if (array_key_exists($Command, $Model->Commands)) {
00110         $run= FALSE;
00111 
00112         ComputeArgCounts($Model->Commands, $ArgV, $Command, $ActualArgC, $ExpectedArgC, $AcceptableArgC, $ArgCheckC);
00113 
00114         // Extra args are OK for now, will drop later
00115         if ($ActualArgC >= $AcceptableArgC) {
00116             if ($ArgCheckC === 0) {
00117                 $run= TRUE;
00118             }
00119             else {
00120                 // Check only the relevant args
00121                 $run= ValidateArgs($Model->Commands, $Command, $ArgV, $ArgCheckC);
00122             }
00123         }
00124         else {
00125             $ErrorStr= "[$AcceptableArgC]: $ActualArgC";
00126             ViewError(_('Not enough args')." $ErrorStr");
00127             cwc_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "Not enough args $ErrorStr");
00128         }
00129 
00130         if ($run) {
00131             if ($ActualArgC > $ExpectedArgC) {
00132                 $ErrorStr= "[$ExpectedArgC]: $ActualArgC: ".implode(', ', array_slice($ArgV, $ExpectedArgC));
00133 
00134                 // Drop extra arguments before passing to the function
00135                 $ArgV= array_slice($ArgV, 0, $ExpectedArgC);
00136 
00137                 ViewError(_('Too many args, truncating')." $ErrorStr");
00138                 cwc_syslog(LOG_WARNING, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "Too many args, truncating $ErrorStr");
00139             }
00140 
00141             if (($Output= call_user_func_array(array($Model, $Command), $ArgV)) !== FALSE) {
00142                 if ($Output !== TRUE) {
00143                     // If func retval is not boolean, it is data, return it
00144                     echo $Output;
00145                 }
00146                 $retval= 0;
00147             }
00148         }
00149         else {
00150             ViewError(_('Not running command').": $Command");
00151             cwc_syslog(LOG_WARNING, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "Not running command: $Command");
00152         }
00153     }
00154     else {
00155         ViewError(_('Unsupported command').": $Command");
00156         cwc_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "Unsupported command: $Command");
00157     }
00158 }
00159 else {
00160     $ErrorStr= "$Models[$View]->$Command()";
00161     ViewError(_('Method does not exist').": $ErrorStr");
00162     cwc_syslog(LOG_WARNING, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "Method does not exist: $ErrorStr");
00163 }
00164 
00165 if ($retval === 1 && isset($ViewError)) {
00166     echo $ViewError;
00167 }
00168 exit($retval);
00169 ?>
